description: Specifies the background color of the plot. If a plot name is not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: s
keywords.description: Plot name. If not specified, the current view is assumed.

keywords.name: color
keywords.description: Background color specification. Accepts multiple formats: (1) color name (e.g., white, black, red, or any SVG color keyword); (2) hex RGB 'colRRGGBB' (e.g., colFFFFFF for white, col000000 for black); (3) 'rgb ir ig ib' with integers 0-255 (e.g., rgb 255 255 255 for white); (4) 'hsv ih is iv' where ih is 0-359, is and iv are 0-255 (e.g., hsv 0 0 255 for white).

examples.description: Set current plot background to white
Set current plot background to black
Set background color of plot 'myplot' to gray

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: itasca.command('plot <name> background <color>') - no direct Python SDK method
